properties.name: table
properties.label: Table
properties.description: Select the table data to display in the list. Optionally, you can add a fixed filter to display specific records from the selected table. Users can't edit or remove a fixed filter.

properties.name: query
properties.label: filter
properties.description: Users can edit or remove this filter. If you set a fixed filter, this filter adds more conditions that further specify which records to display.

properties.name: Background Color
properties.label: background_color
properties.description: Provide a hex value to set the background color.

properties.name: Text Color
properties.label: color
properties.description: Provide a hex value to set the body text color.

properties.name: Header Text Color
properties.label: header_text_color
properties.description: Provide a hex value to set the header text color.

properties.name: Hero Image URL
properties.label: background_image_url
properties.description: Provide a url to an image you would like use as the hero image if you'd like to overwrite the default space man.
